pageProduct.name: Alkira Refine Illuminous Gel Cleanser 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Super bouncy with radiance boosters, coconut surfactants and nourishing oils. SLS and PEG free. A triple duty beauty combination of radiance boosting Australian natives and a custom moisture delivery system formulated to cleanse, hydrate and brighten.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If irritation occurs, rinse immediately and discontinue use. We recommend patch testing. For external use only.

Common Uses

Key Benefits: • Combines vitamin C rich Finger Lime Caviar and Quandong to promote clear radiant skin by delivering citric acids to encourage skin rejuvenation and to unclog pores • Cushioning oils of Coconut and Olive, Shea butter and Aloe Vera to ensure skin feels super clean and fresh • Removes all traces of make up • Leaves skin instantly clean, fresh and radiant • Leave 0 residue

Ingredients

Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Water (Aqua), Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Sodium Laurylglucosides, Hydroxypropylsulfonate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Helianthus Annuus Hybrid (Sunflower) Oil, Santalum Acuminatum (Quandong) Fruit Extract, Citrus Reticulata (Tangerine) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Davidsonia Jerseyana (Davidson Plum) Fruit Extract, Citrus Australasica (Finger Lime) Fruit Extract, Citrus Glauca (Desert Lime) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Sodium Chloride Acrylates/C10-30, Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ethyl Acetate, Cyclohexane, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol, Limonene*

Directions

Apply a small amount to moist hands and lather with water. Gently massage into skin and then rinse thoroughly. Use daily or often as required.
